nodes.text: Garrolkah was a male Dug who served under Sebolto's employ. He was also a member of the Bazurkah Clan in the waning years of the Galactic Republic. Like all members of the clan, he was wanted dead by Bog'Ruhx for supposed slander. The bounty was claimed by the Mandalorian-turned Bounty hunter Jango Fett while he was on Malastare meeting Sebolto.
